resources.string: Pachli is free and open-source software. It is licensed under the GNU General Public License Version 3. You can view the license here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html
Pachli contains code and assets from the following open source projects:
Notifications are not enabled for any of your accounts. Change this in Account Preferences > Notifications. Until then all notifications are disabled.

UnifiedPush (ntfy.sh) is not available, notifications will be periodically pulled. The rest of this section explains why UnifiedPush is not being used, but not relevant to how notifications are currently pulled.
One or more accounts does not have the \'push\' OAuth scope, push notifications are disabled.
All accounts have a UnifiedPush URL?
One or more accounts is not configured with a UnifiedPush URL, push notifications for this account are disabled.
One or more accounts failed to update its UnifiedPush subscription and will not receive notifications.
NTFY is exempt from battery optimization?
NTFY is not exempt from battery optimizations. Android may be delaying notifications whenever the screen is off.
Pachli is exempt from battery optimization?
Pachli is not exempt from battery optimizations. Android may be delaying notifications whenever the screen is off.
This is the list of workers that fetch new notifications. There should be one, the state should be RUNNING or ENQUEUED, and it should be scheduled to run in less than 15 minutes from now.
Irrespective of the notification method, this shows, per-account, when the last fetch occurred, whether it was successful, and the error message if it wasn\'t.
Android can limit what apps can do in the background. This list is how Pachli has been restricted over the last three days, newest first.
Working set. Limited to 10 minutes every 2 hours
Frequent. Limited to 10 minutes every 2 hours
Rare. Limited to 10 minutes every 24 hours
Notifications are being pushed using UnifiedPush, and should be immediate
Notifications are being pulled periodically, approximately every 15 minutes
Notification mechanism has not been determined
UnifiedPush is enabled but had an error: %1$s
